page.title: 02Population Ages, Bridgham
page.content:
From the returns to our survey, the following age pattern is shown:
Ages 0-15 ..... 20% Ages 16-25 ..... 6% Ages 26-45 ..... 29% Ages 46-65 ..... 24% Age 65 + ..... 21%
Quite clearly, the young adult is the least well represented. The reasons are no doubt very similar for many other small villages: a lack of employment opportunities in the immediate locality, loss of village amenities and the nature of the property market, with its very high percentage of owner occupied properties, usually beyond the means of young, first-time buyers. It seems unlikely that our present 20% of youngsters will remain in Bridgham.
